title: phpMyAdmin and mySQL 4.0.18 win by Tu-Jai.zip
description:
DISCLAIMER: NO WARRANITES OF ANY KIND IMPLICIT OR EXPLICIT



Old mySQL and phpMyAdmin (very useful for developement of applications running on servers not very updated) (GNU Public licence, etc.)


Hi peers,

Included in this distribution there are:

1) My SQL Batabase Server version mysql-4.0.18-win

2) PHP myAdmin 3.1.3 (the useful tool to interact with the database-all-languages)


Both files are GNU licence, but they have reired the old versions 
to encourage the distribution of the newer ones.

It took me a hard time searching for both files...

I think they are still useful, in order to assure the compatibility 
with web servers still running 4 versions and/ or older opperative systems.

It took me a hard time to find the files these days... so here they are.

You can find the complete manual of the database at the Sun microsistems site: <a href="
http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/4.1/en/select.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/4.1/en/select.html</a>

The files run under windows 9x and newer.

If you like more information about how to useit, try a search for PHP 
and Apache server. (You can install the newer versions of both from their sites)

Please share whatever file of quality you have!
